result.title: Farm Models and Interoperability Mechanism
result.description: The farm model deals with the management and operation of the farms The farm management system consists of a cloudbased solution to manage agronomic data climate and hydrological data and water quality complemented by tools to handle soil analysis and the irrigationfertilization log
